column6:
Presenting "Weblog," an off-beat Spidey tale which starts at the very beginnings of Spider-Man's career and goes all the way through to the distant future...as seen through the eyes of a woman who is convinced that the webslinger has been stalking her her entire life. ,2006,3

32 PGS./RATED A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Karl Kesel | colorist:Paul Mounts | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
